Compairing values are very trick in dataviz.

```{r setup}
#| echo: fenced
#| warning: false
#| message: false

library(tidyverse)
library(gapminder)

```

Getting life expectancy from South America contries.

```{r}
south_america <- 
  c("Argentina", "Bolivia", "Brazil", "Chile",
    "Colombia", "Ecuador", "Paraguay", "Peru",
    "Uruguay", "Venezuela")
gapminder::gapminder %>% 
  filter(country %in% south_america) 
```
